message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to sell you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your generosity, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $120 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $135.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $125 for the product.
I'm still not willing to go below $140, Bob. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $137.50.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting close to the limit of my patience, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $132.50, but that's as low as I can go.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.
I'm not willing to go back to $130, Bob. I'm willing to make one last offer at $135, but if you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but considering my budget and the negotiations we've had, I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.
